about_the_game:
Descend into the depths of Last Rebirth, a horde survival game. Choose from a diverse array of heroes and engage in battles against eerie adversaries from beyond.

Survive wave after wave until facing one of the lords of sins. Enhance your hero with character traits, abilities, and items, crafting a powerful new build in each run. Delve into various dungeons, discovering potent items that empower you to venture even deeper into the abyss.





  • Embark on your journey as one of the last surviving mortals, each with distinct skills and builds.



  • Hunt for epic glyphs and upgrade your gear through synthesis. By combining glyphs with your equipment, you unlock new abilities, enhance stats, and customize your gear to match your personal combat style.



  • Hunt for runes and enhance your abilities by engraving them.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or equivalent
  • Processor: 4 Cores / 2.5 GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe / Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD RX 570 (Mesa 22.0)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS or equivalent
  • Processor: 4 Cores / 3.5 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD RX 570 (Mesa 22.0)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Face relentless monster hordes in this gripping roguelike adventure. Explore Last Rebirth, where underworld lords await. Collect treasures, fortify heroes, and conquer otherworldly horrors. How far can you push your limits in this survival test?
